name: YouTube Black - KMV
description:
Black YouTube Theme by KMV.

Text & Links customizable.
Note: Custom CSS requires uninstall of old version before updating.

Consider this theme "Clean".
Most colours are B/W until hovered.
Designed to be easy on the eyes - most distractions have been reduced to a minimum.
Works straight out of the box - no "Enable YouTube Dark Theme" again.

Note:
I do not have an YT account, so there are likely elements within user account-pages not covered.

Features custom cursors, -scrollbars, subtle opacities and gradients, hover transitions on Menus, Buttons, Logos and Popups.
Dark Theme on reCAPTCHA & YouTube Login page included.

All options in separate codes. Delete any of these to disable.

Main Player is untouched to accommodate for the many custom interfaces available.


Stylus recommended:
https://add0n.com/stylus.html

The rest of my themes:
https://userstyles.org/users/370722/

Contact;
https://old.reddit.com/r/KMV/

user.name: KMVerum
user.about:
/*

NOTICE:

All my Themes are designed for Stylus;
https://add0n.com/stylus.html

I stopped using Stylish in 2017 when the owner sold us out, and began selling user data:
https://forum.userstyles.org/discussion/53233/announcement-to-the-community/p1

Stylus became the fork of Stylish when this happened.

Stylish has since altered their code to the point where many old CSS standards aren't accepted anymore.
This is especially troublesome on Chrome.

As an example to this:
-My YouTube Dark Theme (as of Oct. 2019), consisted of 1459 lines and works fine in Stylus, but had 866 errors in Stylish.

The time and effort needed to correct all errors on an already working code is a no-go.
More importantly; Privacy is of much greater concern to me.

Description from Stylus website;
"Any and all analytics, telemetry, and data-collection have been removed completely."

PS; If you're on Firefox; They've done pretty much the same thing.
-Waterfox is the alternative;
https://www.waterfox.net/

My themes also work on Tor.

*/

additional_info:
20190827 Published

/*The rest of Update notes from 2019 are removed to not exceed character limit.*/

20200101 Adjusted Zoom on Front Page
20200102 Added a :hover to "More" Button on Results list
20200104 Sorted code. Adjusted Button Hovers & added Dark Background on Disabled Chat
20200112 Less colour and slight borders to buttons, hoverable borders to boxes and popups. Transparent black on previous grey sub-menus and video popups - black instead of grey on tool-tips. General toning down of bright elements. Index split into separate code for better overview.
20200113 Added Dark to Transcript Header Bar.
20200128 Added :hover to "more" in results-list and proper :hover over list items.
20200131 Altered (white) background sometimes visible over videos.
20200213 Added colour transition-delay to Embedded Channel-logo
20200223 Added Dark to Redirect Page Background, and Buttons thereon.
20200301 Added :hovers to text in "clarification" box.
20200329 Fixed a couple of backgrounds + :hovers (Warning Plaque under videos + a couple more)
20200409 #1 Updated reCAPTCHA (Includes new hCaptcha). #2 Added :hover transition to ads. Inverted white pre-load grids.
20200410 Changed (new) White Thumbnail-Preview Background on Video Progress Bar:hover to Transparent Black.
20200411 Removed pre-load-grids entirely
20200413 Corrected Dropdown Highlighting (Selected)
20200415 Added Scrollbar option in description
20200418 Removed Video Player (Skeleton) Frame.
20200422 Dark Scrollbar added.
20200510 Changed Blue Button Borders to Gray, and removed a few unnecessary button:hovers. Added Background to Time Stamps on Video Player Hover-Preview. Tweaked ads and Video Likes/Dislikes.
20200513 Added Dark to new Info-placards under videos and arrows on popups.
20200519 Reduced visibility of Channel Thumb in video. Hover as usual.
20200520 Fixed new Info Panel under videos
20200617 Darkened Music Promotion on Front Page, inverted new Video Ad Overlay and reduced new enlarged thumb-size on Search Results Page.
20200622 Added Dark to "Merch Shelf" Ads under videos and enabled White Arrows on Custom Scrollbars
20200715 Updated reCAPTCHA and rounded a couple of square button-hovers.
20200718 Cursor auto-hide integrated
20200720 Updated cursors. Future updates will follow. Scrollbar has been forced ("!important") to make up for Custom Scrollbar on other pages.
20200721 Changed Colour of Playlist Thumbnail- & Top Loading Bar
20200723 Updated description
20200805 Darkened the new Menu Bar, and fixed some transparency issues on Top Bar/Header that came along with this recent update. Thumbnails have begotten "brightness" instead of "opacity" for a better look. A few main square buttons are now #111 instead of #222.
20200811 Long awaited Interactive Update. Mostly "invisible features", but a lot of tweaking under the hood. Buttons and menu hovers respond more quickly, and the last few features have been added. New Pointers have been appointed. Most interactive elements have been tweaked. Playlist is also revamped. Links and menu's now react to clicks also.
20200813 reCAPTCHA background bled over to embedded video backgrounds > now corrected. Changed text-selection colours slightly, and made setting "!important" -both to stick across browsers.
20200814 Improved in-video Suggestions hover.
20200821 Added dim-effects to merchandise slots under videos
20200829 Added hovers on suggestion-titles at the end of embedded videos.
20200903 Added Dark to a new area on Consent Window. Added slight hovers on buttons.
20200904 Inverted a Log-In image (Keyhole w/ white background)
20200911 Removed new Consent Prompt.
20200913 Re-enabled Consent prompt, as it paused auto-playing videos. Corrected Playlist Overview Hover and added hovers on Channel Subscriptions.
20200918 Removed "google.com" from the main css, as code interfered with too many elements. Most google-users here surely already have a theme there. Fixed "Language" & "Location" on-click in dropdown menu.
20200922 Added hovers to "Latest YouTube posts" on front page, and removed a Gray BG on scrollable shelf on the same.
20200930 Corrected hover and click on Show/Hide Chat Button. Added dark background to secondary scrollbars (in windows) & black pointer to new item-hover on front page.
20201002 Darkened Consent Background on Chrome based browser to avoid white blinking when loading it's content. Author avatar under video made B/W w/hoverable colour.
20201007 Added Dark BG to new Notification Header on top of search results ("controversial content"...) and corrected "Play All" button hovers on Playlist overview. Added Black Pointer to new popup elements at the end of videos.
20201010 Added Dark BG, Pointers and hovers to new Donation Notification.
20201018 Removed a brightness setting disabling video output on embedded (iframe) and fullscreen videos on Chrome. Removed pointer on fullscreen on the same (autohide reinstated on Chrome - Not sure if a recent YT update, or overlooked on my part).
20201106 Added Dark to Overlay Buttons.
20201123 Added pointer. Tweaked new Top Bar.
20201129 Restored Dark to Tor Error page.
20201209 Simple update to Announcements on Front Page.
20201221 Updated Popup Notification for new embedded Autoplay Button, added borders to Chat & tweaked most dimming hovers. Text & Links are now Customizable.
20210309 B/W to new YT Logo on Top Bar. Updated Black Mouse Pointer on Info Field under selected videos. Tweaked new "Cancel" & "Up Next" buttons at the end of videos.
20210318 Added Dark to new Dropdown elements, Chat pinned comment, and Tooltip. Pointers updated.
20210325 Fixed false hovers on new Vote Buttons Bar
20210406 Included elements on new Consent page.
20210408 Tweaked all elements on Consent Page to B/W. Fixed Voting Area in comment section and re-added link-hover on Suggested Video Titles at the end of videos to accommodate the latest YT update.
20210410 Update to new Dropdown element Hover in Channel Sort List. Added "Click-function" to  buttons on Consent page. Fixed a semi-transparent background on Search Bar Tooltip. Fixed new Channel Tabs and re-integrated Video Lists Hover- & On-click Brightness.
20210412 More elements discovered: Video Lists under videos now have proper Hover and On-Click function again. New Popups have been reinstated with Dark Background on Hover. Selected Advertisements and Notifications with White Background are now Black. Fixed hover on Left Side Slide Menu Options. Main Left hand side Highlighted Icons are now Brighter. Main BG under "Discover" is corrected to Black instead of Grey.
20210415 Updating to Update continuing: Re-added Dark to Chat Show/Hide Button, and removed new Blue Border around main buttons. Dark BG to new Propaganda on Front Page and Gradient Button in "Explore" section.
